text: Faridpur may refer to: ==Bangladesh== * Faridpur, Bangladesh, a city and district headquarter in Faridpur District * Faridpur District, a district in Dhaka Division ==India== * Faridpur (Assembly constituency), Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly * Faridpur Village, a village in Siwan district of Bihar state * Faridpur, Uttar Pradesh, a town in Uttar Pradesh ==Pakistan== * Faridpur, Khanewal, Punjab Province * Faridpur, Multan, Punjab Province * Faridpur, Narowal, Punjab Province
title: Faridpur
